channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Maximo Anywhere
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Maximo Anywhere

item.title: CVE-2017-1604|2024-08-05T13:39:32.252Z -- ibm -- maximo%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Maximo Anywhere 7.5 and 7.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 132851.
